body.p: The contains a rechargeable battery that lasts an entire school day when fully charged. Charge the battery before using the for the first time since it is not shipped with a full charge.

ol.li: Connect the USB cable to the USB port on the .
Connect the other end of the USB cable to a USB charger or powered USB port.

body.p: The battery status light will be solid yellow while the battery is charging and will change to solid green when the battery is fully charged.
